title: Tamerlane the Great a tragedy : as it is acted by Their Majesties servants at the Theatre Royal / by C. Saunders, Gent.
author: Saunders, C. (Charles), fl. 1681.
publisher: Printed for Richard Bentley and M. Magnes ...,
notes: "... I drew the design of this play, from a late novell, call'd Tamerlane and Asteria ..."--Pref.
With commendatory verse by John Banks and epilogue by Dryden which describes the author as a boy.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
